name: ActiveCampaign Tool
semantic_context: Create and edit data in ActiveCampaign
natural_language_description: 这是 ActiveCampaign Tool 节点。主要用于: Create and edit data in ActiveCampaign

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.default: Create and edit data in ActiveCampaign
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Create and edit data in ActiveCampaign | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: contact

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: getAll
available_options: Get Many (值: getAll) - Get data of many order products
Get by Product ID (值: getByProductId) - Get data of a ordered product
Get by Order ID (值: getByOrderId) - Get data of an order's products

tagType.name: tagType
tagType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Type | 作用: Tag-type of the new tag | 默认值: contact | (必填项)

name.name: name
name.description: The name associated with the account in the external service. Often this will be a company name (e.g., "My Toystore, Inc.").
name.natural_language_description: 参数名: Account Name | 作用: The name associated with the account in the external service. Often this will be a company name (e.g., "My Toystore, Inc."). | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: acceptsMarketing (值: None) - Whether customer has opt-ed in to marketing communications

tagId.name: tagId
tagId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
tagId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tag Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | (必填项)

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 作用: The fields to update | 默认值: {}
available_options: connectionid (值: None) - The ID of the connection object for the service where the customer originates
externalid (值: None) - The ID of the customer in the external service
email (值: None) - The email address of the customer
acceptsMarketing (值: None) - Whether customer has opt-ed in to marketing communications

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 100

simple.name: simple
simple.description: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data
simple.natural_language_description: 参数名: Simplify | 作用: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data | 默认值: True

contactId.name: contactId
contactId.description: ID of the contact to get
contactId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Contact ID | 作用: ID of the contact to get | 默认值: 0 | (必填项)

contactTagId.name: contactTagId
contactTagId.description: ID of the contact tag to delete
contactTagId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Contact Tag ID | 作用: ID of the contact tag to delete | 默认值: 0 | (必填项)

listId.name: listId
listId.natural_language_description: 参数名: List ID | (必填项)

accountId.name: accountId
accountId.description: ID of the account to get
accountId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Account ID | 作用: ID of the account to get | 默认值: 0 | (必填项)

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}

account.name: account
account.natural_language_description: 参数名: Account ID | (必填项)

contact.name: contact
contact.description: The ID of the deal's contact
contact.natural_language_description: 参数名: Deal's Contact ID | 作用: The ID of the deal's contact | 默认值: 0 | (必填项)

accountContactId.name: accountContactId
accountContactId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Account Contact ID | 作用: Account ID | (必填项)

email.name: email
email.description: The email address of the customer
email.natural_language_description: 参数名: Customer Email | 作用: The email address of the customer | (必填项)

updateIfExists.name: updateIfExists
updateIfExists.description: Whether to update user if it exists already. If not set and user exists it will error instead.
updateIfExists.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update if Exists | 作用: Whether to update user if it exists already. If not set and user exists it will error instead. | 默认值: False

title.name: title
title.natural_language_description: 参数名: Title | 作用: The title of the deal | (必填项)

value.name: value
value.description: The value of the deal in cents
value.natural_language_description: 参数名: Deal Value | 作用: The value of the deal in cents | 默认值: 0 | (必填项)

currency.name: currency
currency.description: The currency of the order (3-digit ISO code, e.g., "USD")
currency.natural_language_description: 参数名: Order Currency | 作用: The currency of the order (3-digit ISO code, e.g., "USD") | 默认值: eur | (必填项)
available_options: São Tomé and Príncipe Dobra (Pre-2018) (值: std)
São Tomé and Príncipe Dobra (值: stn)

group.name: group
group.description: The pipeline ID of the deal
group.natural_language_description: 参数名: Deal Pipeline ID | 作用: The pipeline ID of the deal

stage.name: stage
stage.description: The stage ID of the deal
stage.natural_language_description: 参数名: Deal Stage ID | 作用: The stage ID of the deal

owner.name: owner
owner.description: The owner ID of the deal
owner.natural_language_description: 参数名: Deal Owner ID | 作用: The owner ID of the deal

dealId.name: dealId
dealId.description: The ID of the deal note
dealId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Deal ID | 作用: The ID of the deal note | (必填项)

dealNote.name: dealNote
dealNote.description: The content of the deal note
dealNote.natural_language_description: 参数名: Deal Note | 作用: The content of the deal note

dealNoteId.name: dealNoteId
dealNoteId.description: The ID of the deal note
dealNoteId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Deal Note ID | 作用: The ID of the deal note | (必填项)

service.name: service
service.natural_language_description: 参数名: Service | 作用: The name of the service | (必填项)

externalid.name: externalid
externalid.description: The ID of the customer in the external service
externalid.natural_language_description: 参数名: Customer ID | 作用: The ID of the customer in the external service | (必填项)

logoUrl.name: logoUrl
logoUrl.description: The URL to a logo image for the external service
logoUrl.natural_language_description: 参数名: Logo URL | 作用: The URL to a logo image for the external service | (必填项)

linkUrl.name: linkUrl
linkUrl.description: The URL to a page where the integration with the external service can be managed in the third-party's website
linkUrl.natural_language_description: 参数名: Link URL | 作用: The URL to a page where the integration with the external service can be managed in the third-party's website | (必填项)

connectionId.name: connectionId
connectionId.description: ID of the connection to get
connectionId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Connection ID | 作用: ID of the connection to get | 默认值: 0 | (必填项)

externalcheckoutid.name: externalcheckoutid
externalcheckoutid.description: The ID of the cart in the external service. ONLY REQUIRED IF EXTERNALID IS NOT INCLUDED.
externalcheckoutid.natural_language_description: 参数名: External Checkout ID | 作用: The ID of the cart in the external service. ONLY REQUIRED IF EXTERNALID IS NOT INCLUDED.

source.name: source
source.description: The order source code (0 - will not trigger automations, 1 - will trigger automations)
source.natural_language_description: 参数名: Order Source | 作用: The order source code (0 - will not trigger automations, 1 - will trigger automations) | 默认值: 0 | (必填项)

totalPrice.name: totalPrice
totalPrice.description: The total price of the order in cents, including tax and shipping charges. (i.e. $456.78 => 45678). Must be greater than or equal to zero.
totalPrice.natural_language_description: 参数名: Total Price | 作用: The total price of the order in cents, including tax and shipping charges. (i.e. $456.78 => 45678). Must be greater than or equal to zero. | 默认值: 0 | (必填项)

connectionid.name: connectionid
connectionid.description: The ID of the connection object for the service where the customer originates
connectionid.natural_language_description: 参数名: Service ID | 作用: The ID of the connection object for the service where the customer originates | (必填项)

customerid.name: customerid
customerid.description: The ID of the customer associated with this order
customerid.natural_language_description: 参数名: Customer ID | 作用: The ID of the customer associated with this order | 默认值: 0 | (必填项)

externalCreatedDate.name: externalCreatedDate
externalCreatedDate.description: The date the order was placed
externalCreatedDate.natural_language_description: 参数名: Creation Date | 作用: The date the order was placed | (必填项)

abandonedDate.name: abandonedDate
abandonedDate.description: The date the cart was abandoned. REQUIRED ONLY IF INCLUDING EXTERNALCHECKOUTID.
abandonedDate.natural_language_description: 参数名: Abandoning Date | 作用: The date the cart was abandoned. REQUIRED ONLY IF INCLUDING EXTERNALCHECKOUTID.

orderProducts.name: orderProducts
orderProducts.natural_language_description: 参数名: Products | 作用: All ordered products | 默认值: {}
available_options: name (值: None) - The name of the product
price (值: None) - The price of the product, in cents. (i.e. $456.78 => 45678). Must be greater than or equal to zero.
externalid (值: None) - The ID of the product in the external service
category (值: None) - The category of the product
sku (值: None) - The SKU for the product
description (值: None) - The description of the product
imageUrl (值: None) - An Image URL that displays an image of the product
productUrl (值: None) - A URL linking to the product in your store

orderId.name: orderId
orderId.description: The ID of the order whose products you'd like returned
orderId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Order ID | 作用: The ID of the order whose products you'd like returned | 默认值: 0

ecommerceCustomerId.name: ecommerceCustomerId
ecommerceCustomerId.description: ID of the E-commerce customer to get
ecommerceCustomerId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Customer ID | 作用: ID of the E-commerce customer to get | 默认值: 0 | (必填项)

procuctId.name: procuctId
procuctId.description: The ID of the product you'd like returned
procuctId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Product ID | 作用: The ID of the product you'd like returned | 默认值: 0
